categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic squads

nodes.text: Alpha-2 Squad was a squad of clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Republic. Clones of the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett, the soldiers of Alpha-2 Squad were sent to an unknown planet where they were killed by the energy vampire, Countess Rajine, only to later be used as zombie servants. They were released from their undead fate by Jedi Master Mace Windu, who defeated Rajine.
